column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A motorcyclist died at 10:50 pm on February 23
column5: near the sewer station in Sangkat Toul Sangke 1
column7: Phnom Penh.------The victim was identified as a South Korean (*OH SEJOON?)
column11: Por Sen Chey district.------Before the accident
column14: was travelling from the west at high speed when it hit the central divider. The Korean rider died instantly.------After the incident
column15: the police visited the location to take the evidence to the police station
column16: and the victim’s body was taken to Wat Teuk Thla. ------POSTNEWS
